subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Dale Murphy and Andre Dawson, two slugging outfielders from the 1980s, are on the Hall of Fame ballot. But one is close to being bumped off.
snippet: Dale Murphy and Andre Dawson, two slugging outfielders from the 1980s, are on the Hall of Fame ballot. But one is close to being bumped off.
